metadata.Title: CVE-2017-14633 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
In Xiph.Org libvorbis 1.3.5, an out-of-bounds array read vulnerabilityexists in the function mapping0_forward() in mapping0.c, which may lead toDoS when operating on a crafted audio file with vorbis_analysis().

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-14633` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvorbis0a - 1.3.5-3ubuntu0.1
libvorbisenc2 - 1.3.5-3ubuntu0.1
libvorbisfile3 - 1.3.5-3ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libvorbis package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.3.5-3ubuntu0.1').
